product_name: Columbia All-Day Cruiser Backpack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Prefect for everyday outings, this backpack-style canvas purse features a clean, unstructured square shape with a front zippered pocket and main stash pocket that closes with a drawstring and flap.
short_description: Prefect for everyday outings, this backpack-style canvas purse features a clean, unstructured square shape with a front zippered pocket and main stash pocket that closes with a drawstring and flap.
